sentences.en: A conservatory offers the perfect excuse to let your imagination run riot.
sentences.cn: 音乐学院让你有充分的理由任想象力自由驰骋。

sentences.en: A lot of language students want to run before they can walk.
sentences.cn: 很多学习语言的学生都好高骛远。

sentences.en: a pedestrian who was run down by a speeding motorist.
sentences.cn: 被一辆疾驰的摩托车撞倒的行人

sentences.en: a state-run (= controlled by the government ) television station
sentences.cn: 国营电视台

sentences.en: an insurance policy that had run out.
sentences.cn: 已过期的保险单

sentences.en: Courses are currently being run in London and Edinburgh.
sentences.cn: 目前伦敦和爱丁堡两地都开设了这些课程。

sentences.en: Detectives ran down the suspects.
sentences.cn: 侦探抓获了嫌疑犯

sentences.en: Developers want to run a road right through his farm.
sentences.cn: 开发商想修一条路，正好穿过他的农场。

sentences.en: Don't run her down; she is very talented.
sentences.cn: 不要贬低她；她很有天分的

sentences.en: Fifteen-year-old Danny is on the run from a local authority home.
sentences.cn: 15岁的丹尼从地方当局的收容所逃跑了。

sentences.en: For a while, she ran a restaurant in Boston.
sentences.cn: 有一段时间她在波士顿开餐馆。

sentences.en: found public sentiment running against him.
sentences.cn: 发现公众反对他的情绪

sentences.en: He desperately dodged a speeding car trying to run him down.
sentences.cn: 他拼命地闪身躲开一辆试图撞倒他的疾驰的汽车。

sentences.en: He finally became tired of running after her.
sentences.cn: 他追求她终于追烦了

sentences.en: He is always running on about his tax problems.
sentences.cn: 对于他税务方面的问题，他总是讲个不停

sentences.en: He run across a dog.
sentences.cn: 他偶然遇到只小狗.

sentences.en: His net worth runs into seven figures.
sentences.cn: 他的净值达到了七位数

sentences.en: His opponents believe he is definitely on the run.
sentences.cn: 对手认为他必败无疑。

sentences.en: I excused myself and ran back to the telephone.
sentences.cn: 我道了歉，跑回去接电话。

sentences.en: I just thought you might have run across him before.
sentences.cn: 我刚刚在想你以前可能偶然碰见过他。

sentences.en: I learned a lot from him about how to run a band.
sentences.cn: 我从他那里学到了许多关于经营乐队方面的东西.

sentences.en: I ran across her in the public library yesterday.
sentences.cn: 我昨天在公共图书馆碰巧遇见了她。

sentences.en: If unused, winter radishes run to seed in spring.
sentences.cn: 如果不去动的话，冬萝卜会在春天开花结籽。

sentences.en: In the long run, it was for the best.
sentences.cn: 长远来说，这是最好的。

sentences.en: Let's run through the first act again.
sentences.cn: 我们再排练一下第一场

sentences.en: Many people belong to a pension scheme run by their employers.
sentences.cn: 许多人参加了由雇主管理的养老金计划。

sentences.en: Many people don’t care who runs the country.
sentences.cn: 很多人不在乎由谁统治国家。

sentences.en: Our supplies finally ran out.
sentences.cn: 我们的供给终于耗尽了

sentences.en: Perot hoped to run another series of campaign infomercials.
sentences.cn: 佩罗期待着新一轮的竞选宣传节目的播出。

sentences.en: ran in an illustration next to the first paragraph.
sentences.cn: 在第一段旁边加上插图

sentences.en: ran into an old friend.
sentences.cn: 与一个老朋友不期而遇

sentences.en: ran into trouble.
sentences.cn: 陷入麻烦

sentences.en: ran off 200 copies of the report.
sentences.cn: 把这个报告复制了200份

sentences.en: ran up huge bills; run up the price of the company's stock.
sentences.cn: 积欠很大的债务；使公司股票的价格升值

sentences.en: run down a list once more.
sentences.cn: 再浏览一下单子

sentences.en: run over a speech before giving it.
sentences.cn: 演说之前浏览一下演讲稿

sentences.en: Run the cables under the carpet.
sentences.cn: 把电缆铺在地毯下面。

sentences.en: She ran across some old letters when she was looking for something else.
sentences.cn: 她找别的东西时, 偶然翻出几封过去的信。

sentences.en: She ran through all her money.
sentences.cn: 她很快花完了所有的钱

sentences.en: The alarm clock finally ran down.
sentences.cn: 闹钟终于停了

sentences.en: The bank must be run in a cost-effective way.
sentences.cn: 银行的经营必须追求成本效益。

sentences.en: The car ran over a child.
sentences.cn: 那辆汽车碾过了孩子

sentences.en: The crew ran through the preflight procedures. We ran through the witness's testimony before presenting it in court.
sentences.cn: 机组人员又复习了一遍飞行前的程序。在法庭上出示之前，我们先过目一下见证人的证词

sentences.en: The infantry would use hit and run tactics to slow attacking forces.
sentences.cn: 步兵团可能会使用打了就跑的战术来阻滞进攻部队。

sentences.en: The meeting ran over by 30 minutes.
sentences.cn: 会议拖了30分钟了

sentences.en: The police ran down all possible leads in the missing-person case.
sentences.cn: 警察查遍了这件失踪案的所有可能的线索

sentences.en: The rage in his eyes made her blood run cold.
sentences.cn: 他眼中的怒火吓得她汗毛倒竖。

sentences.en: The road runs along a valley.
sentences.cn: 这条路沿山谷延伸。

sentences.en: The Sierra mountain range runs the length of the north west coast of Majorca.
sentences.cn: 谢拉山脉横贯马略卡岛西北海岸。

sentences.en: The soldier was run through by a bayonet.
sentences.cn: 士兵被刺刀刺透了

sentences.en: Their luck had simply run out. Still, never fear.
sentences.cn: 他们的好运已经到头了。不过，别担心。

sentences.en: There will be a run-off between these two candidates on December 9th.
sentences.cn: 12月9日将举行这两位候选人的决胜选举。

sentences.en: Three days into production, the kitty had run dry.
sentences.cn: 才投产3天凑集的钱就用光了。

sentences.en: We ran him out of town.
sentences.cn: 我们把他驱逐出镇子

sentences.en: We ran in for an hour.
sentences.cn: 我们拜访了一个小时

sentences.en: We've run across a slight problem.
sentences.cn: 我们碰到了一个小问题。

sentences.en: When did you run across her?
sentences.cn: 你什么时候碰到她的？

sentences.en: You feel an animal panic to run and hide.
sentences.cn: 你会感到一种本能的恐惧而想要去逃避。

words.tran_cn: 连续的；流动的；跑着的；运转着的
跑步者；走私者；推销员；送信人

phrases.tran_cn: 从短期看，在不久的将来
追求：为求爱而找伴或吸引其注意力
&I{【棒球】} 夹杀：当跑垒员陷入两垒之间后将其推出
竞选；匆匆去取；赶紧去请
非正式访问，顺便看望：为交往目的而去与…相伴；拜访
赶走，驱逐（例如，私入地界者）
不分段，不换行：不间断地接连下去
期满：因期满或疏漏而无效
匆匆看过：把…的突出点或事实过目一下
运行时间；电脑运作时间

trans.tran_cn: 奔跑，行程，放映期，一系列，趋向，态势
trans.tran_en: to be very busy and continuously rushing about
to organize or be in charge of an activity, business, organization, or country
to try to be elected in an election

trans.tran_cn: 使奔跑，使…快速移动，运行，经营，划
trans.tran_en: to organize or be in charge of an activity, business, organization, or country
